net.metro.systemobjects

Class SystemObjects

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.metro.systemobjects.SystemObjects

  • public class SystemObjects
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a container database of all objects relating to routes, route paths, stops, waypoints, services, and data. Each encapsulated object is a container for a lower level system object until it reaches the lowest levels (WayPoints, Stops, and Data objects.
    Author:
    Sean Harger

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Constructs an empty SystemObjects database.

    • Method Detail

      • routeExists

        public boolean routeExists(int routeNum)
        Determines whether a route exists in the database with the specified route id.
        Parameters:
        routeNum - route id to search for
        Returns:
        true if a route with the specified route id exists in the database

      • checkOtherRoutesForId

        public boolean checkOtherRoutesForId(Route rteToExclude)
        Determines whether the specified Route is duplicated in the database. This is especially helpful when the user is attempting to add a duplicate Route using the LineEditor.
        Parameters:
        rteToExclude - Route to check for duplication
        Returns:
        true if the database contains a duplicate.

      • getRoute

        public Route getRoute(int routeNum)
        Finds the Route with the specified route id and returns it.
        Parameters:
        routeNum - route id of the Route desired
        Returns:
        the matching Route or null if none is found.

      • getAllRoutes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getAllRoutes()
        Returns a list of all the Routes in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all the Routes in the database.

      • getAllServices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Service> getAllServices()
        Returns a list of all the Services in the database. Returns a list of all the Services in the database.
        Returns:

      • getServicesWithConstraint

        public java.util.ArrayList<Service> getServicesWithConstraint(java.util.ArrayList<RoutePath> rtePthConstraint,
                                                     Period pdConstraint)
        Finds all Services in the database matching the specified RoutePath and Period constraints.
        Parameters:
        rtePthConstraint - desired RoutePath for the returned services to be a part of
        pdConstraint - desired Period for the returned services to operate during
        Returns:
        list of Service objects matching the RoutePath and Period constraints.

      • addRoute

        public void addRoute(Route rte)
        Adds the specified Route to the database and sorts the routes by their route id.
        Parameters:
        rte - Route to add

      • removeRoute

        public void removeRoute(Route rte)
        Removes the specified Route from the database.
        Parameters:
        rte - Route to remove
